Articles.Content:
KSP: 0.25.0642 Windows 32bit

Problem: Rocket has clipped fuel tank which explodes on launch; atttempting to remove offending part in VAB causes the part to 'stick' to the mouse, and the VAB editor to no longer respond correctly to mouse clicks or keyboard input.

Mods Installed:

Better Than Starting Manned 1.647

Deadly Reentry 6.2

Final Frontier 0.5.6b

PreciseNode 1.1.1

ModuleManager 2.5.0

Reproduction Steps: Load the linked craft file. Attempt to launch. Observe explosions (one TL-800 tank on the third stage). Revert to vehicle assembly, attempt to grab clipped/duplicated part. Watch editor go weird.

Log: output log, craft file

I'm thinking this is probably something that somehow got connected weirdly when I was making the rocket; duplicated something where I shouldn't have, or something. I'm hoping that I can fix this with a relatively simple modification to the .craft and not have to rebuild it from scratch? But I've not gone delving into the .craft files before, and any attempt to open it IN the editor causes...weirdness. Picking up the offending fuel tank causes it to move, but not the engine/RCS thruster/fuel line that are nominally attached to it, and then I can't set it back down. Once the entire KSP program crashed.

EDIT: Rebuilt part file from scratch; no dupe errors this time.

Edited October 15, 2014 by woggy
Wait... never mind. Delete the offending .craft file

Wait... never mind. Delete the offending .craft file

I was hoping for a solution that didn't mean recreating an evening's worth of work. I'll do it if I have to.

Well, I've attempted a quick hack-job on your craft file to remove the extra fuel tank that is confusing the VAB but I don't have the mods installed so I can't actually test it.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/tela46bmcihtfmv/Moho_bugged_fixed.craft?dl=0

If it works, great. If not, then I could try removing the launcher from under the payload so you have to rebuild less...

Well, I've attempted a quick hack-job on your craft file to remove the extra fuel tank that is confusing the VAB but I don't have the mods installed so I can't actually test it.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/tela46bmcihtfmv/Moho_bugged_fixed.craft?dl=0

If it works, great. If not, then I could try removing the launcher from under the payload so you have to rebuild less...

Alas, something Exceedingly Funky is still going on. Thanks for trying, Padishar; I'll just rebuild it.

Alas, something Exceedingly Funky is still going on. Thanks for trying, Padishar; I'll just rebuild it.

Doh! I somehow missed the extra decoupler, engine, RCS block and fuel line that went along with the fuel tank.

Try this one if you haven't rebuilt already:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/vgyvl6hvckuqu20/Moho_bugged_fixed_again.craft?dl=0

If that doesn't work then I will give up.
